document.full_text: johnson & johnson said it was recalling more than 700,000 bottles or packages of tylenol and other consumer medicines made at a now-closed plant, the latest in a litany of recalls by the company.
document.title: j&j recalling more tylenol from closed plant
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson said it was recalling more than 700,000 bottles or packages of tylenol and other consumer medicines made at a now-closed plant, the latest in a litany of recalls by the company.
